Package pacman.models.characters

Class Ghost

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.scene.Node
      • javafx.scene.shape.Shape
        • javafx.scene.shape.Rectangle
          • pacman.models.characters.Ghost
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable, javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget, Moveable
    public class Ghost
extends javafx.scene.shape.Rectangle
implements java.lang.Runnable, Moveable
    Model for the Ghosts on the map.

      • Ghost

        public Ghost​(double x,
             double y,
             int color)
        Constructor initialises default values for the Ghost.
        Parameters:
        x - The x-position for the Ghost.
        y - The y-position for the Ghost.
        color - Integer representation of the color of the ghost (1-5).

    • Method Detail

      • getRandomDirection

        private java.lang.String getRandomDirection​(java.lang.String exclude1,
                                            java.lang.String exclude2)
        Generate a random direction (up,down,left,right)
        Parameters:
        exclude1 - Guaranteed to not be the generated direction.
        exclude2 - Guaranteed to not be the generated direction.
        Returns:
        A random direction, that is not one of the excluded.

      • checkIftheresPathToGo

        private void checkIftheresPathToGo​(java.lang.String direction)
        Checks if movement in the specified direction will hit an obstacle, and sets the direction if not.
        Parameters:
        direction - Direction of travel to check if there is a path in.

      • moveUntilYouCant

        private void moveUntilYouCant​(java.lang.String whereToGo,
                              java.lang.String whereToChangeTo,
                              double leftEdge,
                              double topEdge,
                              double rightEdge,
                              double bottomEdge,
                              double padding)
        Generates random direction changes for the Ghosts.
        Parameters:
        whereToGo - Current direction of movement.
        whereToChangeTo - Direction to move if unable to continue in current direction.
        leftEdge - X-Position of the left edge of the Ghost.
        topEdge - Y-Position of the top edge of the Ghost.
        rightEdge - X-Position of the right edge of the Ghost.
        bottomEdge - Y-Position of the bottom edge of the Ghost.
        padding - Padding maintained between Ghost and Obstacles.
